game.name: Animal Times
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 터치 전용 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Command animal armies and conquer territories in this turn-based strategy game where every attack can backfire! Master blunder-style combat, where failed strikes let defenders capture your lands. Bold moves win big in this high-stakes battle for cunning victory.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Command animal armies and conquer territories in this turn-based strategy game where every attack can backfire! Master blunder-style combat, where failed strikes let defenders capture your lands. Bold moves win big in this high-stakes battle for cunning victory.
